content.raw:
Gotcha, that makes sense, I wasn't aware that we were planning to expand it.

Even so, the code is so similar right now that my preference would still be to add the missing parameter to the existing plugin instead of copying the code to a new plugin. This way we make sure that whenever a feature is added or a bug is fixed in diff drive, any tracked vehicles can also benefit. When we get to the point of implementing a more accurate model, then we can revisit this and add a new plugin if needed. Based on past experience, there's a high chance we don't revisit this for years and end up with 2 very similar plugins which have different bug fixes :grimacing:

Would it be too much trouble to add the parameter to diff drive and adapt the example to use that?
